thread.title: Bentley Continental Supersports: The fastest four-seater - Roadshow
thread.title_full: Bentley Continental Supersports: The fastest four-seater - Roadshow

author: Wayne Cunningham
title: Bentley Continental Supersports: The fastest four-seater - Roadshow
text:
1 of 26   The fastest four-seater 
Bentley announced   at the beginning of this year, and its 700 horsepower immediately invited inappropriate comparison to the Dodge Challenger Hellcat. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
Unlike the Dodge,   is a high-end luxury car, with limited production numbers. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
The model's heritage goes back to the 1920s, when Bentley released a Supersports version of its 3-liter car that could hit over 100 mph. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
  builds on the Continental model that Bentley introduced in 2003. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
As with other Continental models, the Supersports comes with standard all-wheel-drive,   and an adaptive suspension with four settings. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
  will be available as a convertible, shown here, or a coupe. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
Bentley gives the Supersports some unique styling elements, such as black exterior accents. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
Carbon fiber hood vent inserts come as part of the Supersports package. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
The 6-liter W12 engine uses dual twin-scroll turbochargers to produce   Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
These 21-inch wheels are also standard. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00 
See manufacturer website for availability. 
Although an impressive and noteworthy beast of a car, the Continental model shows its age, and could do with some lightweighting and modern electronics. Photo by:   
MSRP: $293,300.00
